question: What new designation did Bath receive in 2021 related to UNESCO?
true_answer: Included in the "Great Spa Towns of Europe"
asked_question_translated: Hvilken ny udnævnelse fik Bath i 2021 i forbindelse med UNESCO?
answer: I 2021 blev Bath udnævnt til en del af UNESCO's World Heritage-fællesbetegnelse "The Great Spa Towns of Europe."
answer_translated_eng: In 2021, Bath was named part of the UNESCO World Heritage joint designation "The Great Spa Towns of Europe."
